title: The land component LM4.1 of the GFDL Earth System Model ESM4.1: Model description and characteristics of land surface climate and carbon cycling in the historical simulation
journal: Journal of Advances in Modeling Earth Systems
contributionStatement: Member of the core model development. Evaluated implications of results for coupled climate and carbon cycle interactions. (D=15\% / A=10\% / I=5\% / W=5\%)
